scripts.copy-fonts: node node_modules/.bin/cpy node_modules/framework7-icons/fonts/*.* src/fonts && node node_modules/.bin/cpy node_modules/material-design-icons/iconfont/*.{eot,ttf,woff,woff2} src/fonts
scripts.postinstall: npm run copy-fonts && [ -d node_modules/framework7-react ] && cp patch/react-component-el.js node_modules/framework7-react/runtime-helpers/react-component-el.js
